markdownRemark.html: This club is located in Malaga. The facilities includes - 2 fast track tennis courts, 7 clay courts, 6 crystal padel courts, football field of artificial grass, children's playground, 25m pool and splash pool, pilates room, personal training, indoor cycle room, pilates reformer room with machines, room for collective activities, changing rooms in the pool area, wardrobe area, tennis, fitness center, parking in green areas and gardens with lots of shade.
